text: TV3 Mentor is a music reality show organized by TV3. The reality show was the first reality show concerning music organized in Ghana. == Awards == {| class="wikitable" |+ !Winner !Season |- |Roselyn Akosua Mantey |Mentor 7 |- |Lee Stone |Mentor 6 |- |Lamuel Ansah-Acquah |Metor 5 |- |Kesse |Metor 4 |- |Erico |Menor 3 |- |Prince |Mentor 2 |- |Prince |Metor 1 |} == References == Category:Ghana-related lists Category:Ghanaian music
title: TV3 Mentor
